Julian Casablancas and his new band, the Voidz, have shared the video for "Where No Eagles Fly", off their forthcoming album Tyranny (check out the sick single artwork, above). Directed by Jeramy "Beardo" Gritter and edited by Andy Sonnefeld, the clip assembles grainy footage of the band into a gritty Gotham collage.
